bug.author: netskink
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/data/ops/dataset_ops.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/data/ops/dataset_ops.py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Need an overall example of how to use tf.data.Dataset</denchmark-h>
It is a struggle to relate the dataset with the keras model code. The model.fit() doc describes how to use a tf.dataset as input but without experimentation its hard to discern the correct format of the dataset. <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
Is the link to the source code correct? Yes. <denchmark-h:h3>Parameters defined</denchmark-h>
Are all parameters defined and formatted correctly? Yes <denchmark-h:h3>Returns defined</denchmark-h>
Are return values defined? <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
Are the errors defined? Yes. <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
Is there a usage example? No. I added an example for the common use case of most users to use the dataset with a simple model.fit call for keras. <denchmark-h:h3>Request visuals, if applicable</denchmark-h>
Are there currently visuals? No. yes, it would be helpful. <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Are you planning to also submit a pull request to fix the issue? Yes. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/29323>[TF 2.0 API Docs] tf.data Add pointer to tutorials which work with r2.0 #29323</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Is this issue still valid? The attached pull requests looks like it's a bit out of sync. For the TF2 ref docs, we now automatically include links to usage in our guide and tutorials. See here: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset</denchmark-link>
These examples are easier for us to test and maintain then any snippets included in the doc strings.

I thought it was closed already On Fri, Jul 12, 2019 at 13:16 Billy Lamberta ***@***.***> wrote: Is this issue still valid? The attached pull requests looks like it's a bit out of sync.
For the TF2 ref docs, we now automatically include links to usage in our guide and tutorials. See here: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset</denchmark-link>
These examples are easier for us to test and maintain then any snippets included in the doc strings.
